title: The Korek Mountain Resort & Spa
text:
The Korek Mountain <a href="Resort">Resort</a> & <a href="Spa">Spa</a> is located on <a href="Mount%20Korek">Mount Korek</a> near the town of Bekhal, <a href="Rawandiz">Rawandoz</a> in the <a href="Autonomy">autonomous</a> Region of <a href="Kurdistan">Kurdistan</a> in Northern <a href="Iraq">Iraq</a>. This resort has been built by <a href="https%3A//daringroup.com/">Darin Group</a> a North Iraq-based general <a href="Trade">trading</a> and <a href="construction">construction</a> company.
The Resort is built on top of the Mount Korek at 1690 m accessible by a <a href="https%3A//glosbe.com/en/en/teleferic">Teleferic</a> (<a href="Aerial%20tramway">cable car</a>) which is approximately 4 km long and starts from TS Base in Bekhal.
The Resort has many activities and has 132 <a href="villa">villa</a>s (Not all open yet as work is still on). The Resort is managed by an international management team appointed by Darin Group.
